mapper.select: select q.id as quId, q.content as quTitle, q.image as quImg, eqa.user_id, eqa.exam_id, eqa.answer_content as answer, o.content as refAnswer, eqa.ai_score as correctScore, eqa.ai_reason as aiReason, e.saq_score as totalScore from t_exam_qu_answer as eqa left join t_question as q on eqa.question_id = q.id left join t_option as o on q.id = o.qu_id left join t_exam as e on e.id = #{examId} where eqa.question_type = 4 and eqa.user_id = #{userId} and eqa.exam_id = #{examId}

SELECT q.id as questionId, q.content as questionContent, eq.score as totalScore, o.content as qusetionAnswer, eqa.answer_content as userAnswer FROM t_exam_qu_answer eqa JOIN t_exam_question eq ON eqa.question_id = eq.question_id JOIN t_question q ON eq.question_id = q.id AND q.is_deleted = 0 JOIN t_option o ON o.qu_id = q.id and o.is_deleted = 0 and o.is_right = 1 WHERE eqa.exam_id = #{examId} AND eqa.user_id = #{userId} AND q.qu_type = '4'
